block.box: damages, whether arising from tort (including negligence), breach of contract or otherwise
under or in connection with this Agreement shall not exceed 75% of the Charges paid, due or
payable under this Agreement in respect of Services provided in the preceding Agreement
Year.
Subject to clauses 38.1 and 38.5, neither party shall be liable to the other party for any indirect
or consequential loss or damage (including indirect loss of business or profit), but this shall not
limit the Supplier’s liability for indirect or consequential losses of the kind referred to in clause
The provisions of clause 38.4 shall not limit the rights of members of [CLIENT]'s Group to
recover for:
direct loss of business or direct loss of profits;
reasonable and documented anticipated savings or underwritten benefits directly
resulting from a Default by the Supplier; or
additional operational and/or administrative costs and expenses reasonably incurred
by [CLIENT] arising from a Default by the Supplier; or
expenditure or charges rendered unnecessary and incurred by [CLIENT] arising from
a Default by the Supplier; or
additional costs incurred by [CLIENT] of procuring Replacement Services where
[CLIENT] has terminated in accordance with clause 40 (Termination); or
additional costs to maintain the Services arising from a Default by the Supplier; or
advertising or communication costs reasonably incurred to limit damage caused to
[CLIENT]’s goodwill arising out of a Default by the Supplier; or
loss, degradation, corruption, inaccuracy of or damage to [CLIENT] Data including
costs and expenses associated with its recovery, rectification and/or reconstruction,
provided that if [CLIENT] has failed to make a backup copy of the affected [CLIENT]
Data in accordance with applicable [CLIENT] Policies, the Supplier shall have no
greater liability under this clause 38.5(h) than it would have had if [CLIENT] had done
so.
For the avoidance of doubt, any direct loss suffered or incurred by any member of [CLIENT]’s
Group shall not be deemed to be an indirect loss of [CLIENT] where [CLIENT] seeks to recover
such losses from the Supplier (subject to the provisions of this clause 38) merely because such
loss is suffered by an [CLIENT] Affiliate and not [CLIENT].
The Supplier's liability under clauses 37.1(d) shall be limited in accordance with clause 38.2.
The parties expressly agree that if any limitation or provision contained or expressly referred to
in this clause 38 is held to be invalid under any Relevant Laws it shall to that extent be deemed
omitted but if any party becomes liable for loss or damage which would otherwise have been
excluded that liability shall be subject to the other limitations and provisions set out in this clause
Service Credits shall not be taken into account when assessing whether the liability caps set
out in this clause have been met or exceeded.
